title: Bold Wave Ring
description: Ride the wave in style with the Bold Wave Ring. Crafted in 18K gold vermeil, this is the perfect piece to layer with other rings or wear on it's own.
details: Crafted in 18K Gold Vermeil, Gold vermeil is sterling silver layered with a thick layer of 18K gold, which is much higher quality than standard gold plating.Width: 2MMProduced in China
